Well, doesn't it just figure... After two days working on this
problem, I d=
ecide to post... And then I find something on Red Hat's
site. They had an i=
ntermediary page coming up that never seemed of any
consequence to me. Afte=
r all, we were getting the login credentials.
But, it appears it was blocki=
ng the ability of Heritrix to load the
page I wanted it to crawl. Wish that=
 was more obvious in the FINE
logging :/. 

I still don't know why I got 20=
+ prereqs for the same URL, though. But
its no doubt related.

Sorry for wa=
sting your time.
Ken
